name: Gor Lab
description:
How long can you survive? 

Vigorous bravadoes would be your only option against the undead. Constrain this apocalypse reckoning to a degree of feasible protocol and inhibit all threats, you do this alone until backup calls. Shoot them all.

Tournaments on Discord
